p: The clinical data will be managed and analyzed by Clinical Data Center of Zhejiang Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine. Personal information about potential and enrolled participants will be collected by researchers and will updated in the Chinese Clinical Trial Registry before and during the trial. SPSS V.21.0 will be used for statistical analysis. SPSS software (Version 19.0) will be used for statistical analysis. The continuous data will be expressed as the mean Â± standard deviation (SD). The categorical data will be expressed as numbers (percentages) or medians. If the P value less than 0.05 will be concerned that there is statistical significance.
